name: Adventures of Barry
description:
This is a 3D adventure game created using Unity.

Barry, the slime, is adventuring around different levels. Try to avoid any traps and enemies and collect items in each level to go to the next one. There are total of 5 levels.

If you are struggling, press Space Bar to move to the next level!

Controls: 
Mouse click: move

Collaborators:
Chenny Yun
Ashley Liu
